long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to copy Prismic.io document inputs from the active browser tab and paste them to another browser tab. Currently, it supports text and RichText inputs. 

How to use:
1. Go to the source prismic document
2. Alt+S to copy
3. Go to the destination prismic document of the same type
4. Shift+Alt+S to paste
 
Key shortcuts can be changed in the extension settings. If the doc has multiple tabs, the above steps have to be repeated in all of them.

Enjoy!
